summary: A skyblue/darkgrey/spring green color scheme with a dark background.(screenshot)
name: settlemyer.vim
description:
This is my first gvim color scheme and it has been adapted from a wonderful .emacs file I found online by someone named Brad Settlemyer (http://deepcopy.org/emacs/dotemacs).  Since I moved to vim I had been looking for a theme like this and I couldn't find one so I tried my best to re-create it.

You can find a screenshot on the color scheme list here:
http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~maverick/VimColorSchemeTest/index-c.html
install_details: Place in your vim colors directory.
